pages.text: Detailed here are the ores found within the $(thing)Nether$(), including whether they're affected by Fortune or Silk Touch.

pages.title: Nether Quartz
pages.text: A white crystalline material. Often used in mechanical devices alongside $(item)Redstone$(). Found embedded in $(item)Netherrack$().$(br2)Silk Touch: True$(br2)Fortune: True

pages.title: Amethyst
pages.text: An uncommon purple gemstone embodying chaos. Found embedded in $(item)Netherrack$().$(br2)Silk Touch: True$(br2)Fortune: True
